description: Macro with an XOR'd payload and a sleep for sandbox evasion

customAttributes.name: xorByte
customAttributes.description: The decimal representation of the byte that the payload will be XOR'd with. Max 255.

compilationAttributes.name: saveAs
compilationAttributes.description: Name of the powershell file to be created, can be full path or just a name

compilationAttributes.name: wordDocOut
compilationAttributes.description: Name of the word doc file to be created by the powershell script.

runHint: Offsec have used 32bit word in the labs. The dev machine is 64bit. Be wary. If wordDocOut is relative it it'll end up in the current users documents folder.
